room.Name: The Pinky Casino
room.Description: Enter the Pinky Casino! Bot operated.

botDescription: This is a bot operated casino. You can play games, and win or lose points.
!cocktail <cocktail> - Get the recipe for a specific cocktail.
!forfeit add <forfeit> - Add a forfeit to the game.
!forfeit draw - Draw a forfeit from the game.
!service add <service> - Add a service to the game.
!service draw - Draw a service from the game.
!pick - Choose someone in the room who isn't the bot or yourself.
This bot runs on a version of Ropeybot customized by Sophie (186990).

cocktails.name: Dragon's Kiss
cocktails.description: A deep, ruby red drink served in a coupe glass. Spiced rum, smokey Islay peated scotch, ginger beer, ghost pepper reduction and a dash of lime.

cocktails.name: Pink Paw
cocktails.description: A fuscia pink strawberry with fresh mint and sherbert. Sweet and zingy, but easily tamed with soda water.
